com.cscguru.client.items

Class ItemManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cscguru.client.items.ItemManager

  • public class ItemManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Generates all items via formatted text files. Stores all images for all items. Handles loot chance for items.
    Author:
    Bryan Bennett
